page.title: 05LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: {Wood Brothers:}Ware is famed for its very large bed,supposedly made for Edward IV.A replica of the bed is one of the items of reproduction furniture made by{Wood Bros.}Originally founded in Shoreditch 60 years ago the company now has a workforce of 125 and makes furniture which is sold worldwide. English oak is no longer used as it is too expensive and difficult to work.New furniture is designed by Mr. Wood and made up at the factory. {Concrete Utilities:}Established in 1925 by Mr.Marks this company originally made concrete paving and kerb stones.Ware was chosen because of its proximity to gravel pits.Today metal is used rather than concrete because of cost.The company makes lamps for street and road lighting,airports,bridges,railways and harbours.
